post.description:
Register a new user.

- Creates user account
- Logs signup event
- Issues access and refresh tokens

Login user with email and password.

- Validates credentials
- Logs login event
- Issues access and refresh tokens in httpOnly cookies

Logout current session.

- Invalidates refresh token
- Clears auth cookies

Refresh access token using refresh token.

- Validates refresh token
- Rotates refresh token (old one invalidated, new one issued)
- Issues new access token

Initiate forgot password flow.

- If user is logged in (has cookies), logs them out first
- Sends OTP to email
- Sets temporary forgot_password_token in httpOnly cookie
- Always returns success (prevents email enumeration)

Complete password reset with OTP verification.

- Verifies forgot_password_token from cookie
- Verifies OTP
- Updates password
- Clears reset token cookie
- Optionally logs out all devices

Change password for authenticated user.

- Verifies current password
- Updates to new password
- Enforces password history/limits

get.description:
List all active sessions for current user.

- Shows device info for each session
- Marks current session

delete.description:
Logout from all devices.

- Revokes all refresh tokens
- Clears current session cookies

Revoke a specific session.

- Logs out the device associated with the session

get.description: Get profile text data only (no files).

post.description: Create profile with text data only.

get.description: Stream profile image.

put.description: Upload/replace profile image. Accepts: jpg, jpeg, png.

get.description: Stream resume file.

put.description: Upload/replace resume file. Accepts: pdf, docx.

schema.title: Response Get Education Api V1 Portfolio Education Get
Response Get Work Experience Api V1 Portfolio Work Experience Get
Response Get Skill Categories Api V1 Portfolio Skill Categories Get
Response Get Skills Api V1 Portfolio Skills Get

get.description:
Get all social media links.
Public endpoint - no authentication required.

schema.title: Response Get Social Media Api V1 Portfolio Social Media Get

post.description:
Create a new social media link.
Requires edit_portfolio permission.

put.description:
Update an existing social media link.
Requires edit_portfolio permission.

delete.description:
Delete a social media link.
Requires edit_portfolio permission.

get.description: Get current user - requires authentication

put.description: Update current user - only name and email (basic edit)

delete.description: Delete the currently authenticated user's account.

put.description: Admin update user - can update all fields including role and verification status

get.description:
Admin endpoint - fetch all users with full details (password_hash is not returned).
Supports simple page/size pagination.

schema.title: Response Fetch All Users Api V1 User Users Get

get.description:
Return a small list of user suggestions (preferred_name or email) matching q.
- DB has indexes on email and preferred_name for faster lookups.
- Limits results on DB and on response (5-10).

parameters.name: q

schema.description: Search query for name or email
schema.title: Q

parameters.description: Search query for name or email

schema.title: Response User Suggestions Api V1 User Suggestion Get

get.description:
Search users by preferred_name or email and return full user details with pagination.
- DB has indexes on email and preferred_name for faster lookups.
- Returns full UserDetailRead objects (with role info).

parameters.name: q

schema.description: Search query for name or email
schema.title: Q

parameters.description: Search query for name or email

schema.title: Response Search Users Api V1 User Search Get
Response List Permissions Api V1 User Permissions Get

put.description:
Update a permission by ID.
Expects a PermissionUpdate body and returns the updated PermissionRead.

delete.description:
Delete a permission by ID.
Returns 204 No Content on success.

schema.title: Response List User Roles Api V1 User Roles Get

put.description:
Update a user role by ID.
Expects a UserRoleUpdate body and returns the updated UserRoleRead.

delete.description:
Delete a user role by ID.
Returns 204 No Content on success.

schema.title: Response List Role Permissions Api V1 User Role Permissions Get

post.description:
Validate whether the current user (from JWT) has at least one of the required roles.
Frontend should POST { required_roles: ["role1", "role2"] } with Authorization header.
Returns { has_role: true } or { has_role: false }.

Admin endpoint to create a normal user.
- Hashes and stores the password (no JWT / no cookie issued).
- If role_id provided, verifies it exists; otherwise assigns default 'user' role.

delete.description: Admin endpoint to delete a user by id.

post.description:
Admin/Super Admin endpoint to reset any user's password.
Requires super_admin or admin role with reset_user_password permission.
No daily limits apply to admin resets.

Logged-in user changes their own password.
Requires current password verification.
Subject to daily limit (2 changes per day).

Initiate forgot password flow OR resend OTP - generates OTP and sends via email.
Sets JWT token as HTTP-only cookie for verification step.

This is the ONLY endpoint for sending OTP (handles both initial and resend).

Rate Limiting:
- 30 second delay between requests
- More than 3 send attempts result in 30 minute block
- 2 successful password resets per 24 hours

Verify OTP and reset password.
Reads JWT token from HTTP-only cookie set during forgot password step.

Rate Limiting:
- 3 wrong OTP attempts result in 30 minute block
- Subject to daily limit (2 forgot password resets per day)

get.description: Public endpoint - Fetch latest non-interesting projects (top 6).

schema.title: Response Get Latest Projects Non Interesting Api V1 Project Projects Latest Get

get.description: Public endpoint - Fetch latest featured projects (top 4).

schema.title: Response Get Featured Projects Api V1 Project Projects Featured Get

get.description: Public endpoint - Return project name suggestions matching query.

schema.title: Response Project Suggestions Public Api V1 Project Projects Suggestion Get

get.description: Public endpoint - Search projects by name with pagination.

schema.title: Response Search Projects Public Api V1 Project Projects Search Get

get.description: Public endpoint - Fetch all projects with pagination (no is_live filter).

schema.title: Response Get All Projects Api V1 Project Projects Get

get.description: Public endpoint - Fetch a single project by ID.
Admin endpoint - Return project name suggestions matching query.

schema.title: Response Project Suggestions Api V1 Project Admin Projects Suggestion Get

get.description:
Admin endpoint - Search projects by name with pagination.
Returns full project details.

schema.title: Response Search Projects Api V1 Project Admin Projects Search Get

get.description: Admin endpoint - Fetch all projects with full details (including non-live) with pagination.

schema.title: Response Get All Projects Admin Api V1 Project Admin Projects Get

post.description:
Admin endpoint - Create a new project.
Supports file upload for project image.

get.description: Admin endpoint - Fetch a single project by ID with full details.

put.description:
Admin endpoint - Update a project.
Can update all fields including image.

delete.description:
Admin endpoint - Delete a project by ID.
Also deletes associated image from GridFS.

get.description:
Fetch all access levels.
Requires authentication.

schema.title: Response Get All Access Levels Api V1 Project Access Levels Get

post.description: Admin endpoint - Create a new access level.

get.description: Fetch a single access level by ID.

put.description: Admin endpoint - Update an access level.

delete.description: Admin endpoint - Delete an access level by ID.

get.description:
Admin endpoint - Search users within a specific project by name or email.
Returns user details with membership info.

parameters.name: project_id

schema.description: Project ID to search users in
schema.title: Project Id

parameters.description: Project ID to search users in

schema.description: Search query for user name or email
schema.title: Q

parameters.description: Search query for user name or email

get.description: Admin endpoint - Fetch all project memberships.

schema.title: Response Get All Memberships Api V1 Project Memberships Get

post.description: Admin endpoint - Add a user to a project (create membership).

delete.description: Admin endpoint - Remove a user from a project (delete membership).

get.description:
Fetch all project memberships for a specific user with project details.
Returns membership info along with project name.
Users can view their own memberships.

schema.title: Response Get Memberships By User Api V1 Project Memberships User  User Id  Get

get.description:
Fetch all memberships for a specific project with user details.
Returns membership info along with user email and preferred name.

schema.title: Response Get Memberships By Project Api V1 Project Memberships Project  Project Id  Get
